coreAttributes.name: Soothe Bell
coreAttributes.description: A bell from another world with a tranquil sound. Apparently it has the power to evolve certain creatures.

effectTooltipLines.line: [style.boldTfGeneric(Transforms)] Eevee into Espeon during the day
[style.boldTfGeneric(Transforms)] Eevee into Sylveon during an Arcane Storm

coreAttributes.applyEffects: #IF(!npc.isPlayer() && npc.isUnique() && (!npc.isSlave() || npc.getOwner().isPlayer())) [style.italicsDisabled(This item does not work on non-slave unique characters...)] #ELSEIF(npc.getSubspecies()==SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Eevee) #IF(game.getCurrentWeather()!=WEATHER_MAGIC_STORM) #IF(game.getHourOfDay()>=6 && game.getHourOfDay()<=20) [##game.getCharacterUtils().reassignBody(npc, npc.getBody(), npc.getGender(), SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Espeon, RACE_STAGE_GREATER, true)] [style.italics([npc.Name] evolved into [npc.a_race]!)] #ELSE [##game.getCharacterUtils().reassignBody(npc, npc.getBody(), npc.getGender(), SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Umbreon, RACE_STAGE_GREATER, true)] [style.italics([npc.Name] evolved into [npc.a_race]!)] #ENDIF #ELSE [##game.getCharacterUtils().reassignBody(npc, npc.getBody(), npc.getGender(), SUBSPECIES_Phobos_Eevee_subspecies_Sylveon, RACE_STAGE_GREATER, true)] [style.italics([npc.Name] evolved into [npc.a_race]!)] #ENDIF #ELSE Nothing seems to happen... #ENDIF

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] gently [npc.verb(ring)] the Soothe Bell. It lets out a faint chime that soothes [npc.her] to the core.
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(hold)] the Soothe Bell up to [npc2.name] and ring it. It lets out a faint chime that soothes [npc2.her] to the core.
